name: Unity
description: A popular engine for 2D and 3D games with extensive support and assets.

name: Unreal Engine
description: A powerful engine known for high-quality graphics and performance, often used in AAA games.

name: Godot
description: An open-source engine for 2D and 3D games with an active community.

name: RPG Maker
description: An engine focused on creating role-playing games with easy-to-use tools.

name: GameMaker
description: A versatile engine for creating 2D games, with both visual scripting and code options.
